title: Ep 302 | Phil Chases a Guy with a Chainsaw and Jase Disagrees with a Preacher
description:
Phil chases one of his workers with a running chainsaw. Jase shares his disagreement with a preacher who interpreted scripture for his own gain. Al tells the story of escaping from the babysitter when he was three years old. And Jase describes the raining of frogs and why one more night with the frogs might not be as bad as it seems.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
